content: *this classic pullover sweater is colorful and cozy lion brand yarn * skill level easy size newborn 3-6 mos 12 mos 18 mos finished chest 21 23 25 27 in 53 5 58 5 63 5 68 5 cm finished length 10 10¾ 11¾ 12½ in 25 5 27 5 30 32 cm #830 cotton-ease or #860 vanna s choice 3 colors 3-4 balls total crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm 4 buttons 3/4 in 2cm diameter pattern puff pieces front back sleeves 2 back and front are worked in puff in stripe sequence sleeves are worked in double_crochet u s construction schematics are provided available on lionbrand com in different versions 60695 croton baby sweater 1 2009 #860 vanna s choice antique rose brick rust 60696 baby sweater 2 2005 #830 cotton-ease violet lime lake 81079ad easy on baby sweater 3 2005 #860 vanna s choice dusty rose brick rust see 10046 easy baby sweater 4 for the microspun version 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-croton-baby-sweater-1 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-baby-sweater-1 3 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/81079ad html 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-baby-sweater
